<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vampire Bat Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=45)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Although the typical vampire bat has a wingspan of 7 inches and doesn’t pose a significant threat to larger prey alone (and indeed, these blood-drinkers can feed without their sleeping victims ever noticing), some unusually aggressive species of these bats hunt in deadly swarms. A churning cloud of vampire bats is much more dangerous than the sum of its individual parts and is capable of inflicting an overwhelming number of bleeding wounds in a frighteningly short span of time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bat_VampireBatSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Vampire Bat Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=45)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +10; echolocation (precise) 20 feet, low-light vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -3
</row>

**Echolocation** A bat swarm can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 11

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 6, piercing 6, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
area damage 3, splash damage 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, fly 30 feet

**Blood Feast** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the bat swarm’s space takes 1d4 piercing damage (DC 16 basic Reflex save). Creatures that fail this save also take 1 persistent bleed damage.

</column>
